overview: MTV Broadcast of the Metallica performance live From Rock Am Ring 2006. 01. Creeping Death / 02.  Fuel / 03. Wherever I May Roam / 04. For Whom the Bell Tolls / 05. Fade to Black / 06. Battery / 07. Master of Puppets / 08. The Thing That Should Not Be / 09. Welcome Home (Sanitarium) / 10. Disposable Heroes / 11. Leper Messiah / 12. Orion [First time played live in its entirety] / 13. Damage, Inc. / 14. Sad But True / 15. Nothing Else Matters / 16. One / 17. Enter Sandman / 18. Last Caress / 19. Seek & Destroy
title: Metallica: Rock AM Ring 2006
